words.source: H1696 wayyiqtol 3ms Piel of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'spake', ESV 'said', NASB 'spoke'

H4872 (מֹשֶׁה, 'Moses'), proper noun masculine; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Moses'
H559 prep. l- + Qal infinitive construct of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'saying', ESV 'saying', NASB 'saying'
H589 (אֲנִי, 'I'), personal pronoun 1cs; KJV 'I am', ESV 'I am', NASB 'I am'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'

H6547 (פַּרְעֹה, 'Pharaoh'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Pharaoh'
H4428 noun common masculine singular construct of מֶלֶךְ 'king'; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'king of'
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם, 'Egypt'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Egypt'
H853 (אֵת), particle direct object marker; untranslated in English

H834 relative pronoun (אֲשֶׁר, 'who, which, that'); KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H589 (אֲנִי, 'I'), personal pronoun 1cs; KJV 'I', ESV 'I', NASB 'I'
H1696 Qal active participle masculine singular of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'say', ESV 'say', NASB 'speak'
H413 preposition אֶל 'to' + 2ms pronominal suffix; KJV 'unto thee', ESV 'to you', NASB 'to you'
